row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_CONNECTION_DETAILS
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Stop by" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_STOP_CRITERIA#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Task ID or Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_TASK#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
!------------------------------------ Powershell script for the action ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- try { ! DECRYPT PASSWORD : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_VSP_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! Connect cmdlet : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "CONNECT CMD: &UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO $vsp_srv_obj = &UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET# -Password $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD -Force try {
! Task ID or Name : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "&TEMP_OPTION_VALUE#" = "&UC4RB_VSP_TASK#"
! Stop by : IF &UC4RB_VSP_STOP_CRITERIA# = "TASK ID" $tasks = Get-Task -Id '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#' : ELSE $tasks = Get-Task | where { $_.name -eq '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#' } : ENDIF
if($tasks.count -eq 0) { throw 'No task exist for the specified inputs.' } ! Stop-Task cmdlet $stopTask = $tasks | Stop-Task -Confirm:$false } finally { try { ! Disconnect from the server if connection is establish : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "DISCONNECT CMD: &UC4RB_VSP_DISCONT_CMDLET#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO &UC4RB_VSP_DISCONT_CMDLET# } catch { Write-Host "Unable to disconnect from the server." Write-Host "INFO: $($error[0].Exception.Message)" } } } catch { $errors = 1 Write-Host "ERROR: $($error[0].Exception.Message)" }
!-----------------------------------Error Handling------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ !Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** STOP TASK ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** STOP TASK ACTION FAILED ********"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_ERRORSTATUS
